gameIntroduction:
You are presented with a question
and have a limited amount of time
to draw said object. Good luck!
scoreGood:
You gained [points] points.
You can be proud of yourself!
scoreBad:
You only gained [points]...
You should try a bit harder next time
scoreWorst:
Did you actually try to play the game?
I'm very disappointed :(
scoreBest:
Wow, you reached the maximal score.
That's amazing! Since you cant get any better
you should head back to work or go outside and play.
